articles.p1: Hey, someone left a job brochure here. Lies always beget more lies! See through one, and their whole story falls apart! Noooooooooooo! Which indicator is that? I'm not sure I see anything there. (Edgeworth... Come to think of it... Edgeworth was pulled into being a prosecutor by Manfred von Karma as well.)
articles.p2: Wonderful. Today's special must be Fillet O' Phoenix! No no no! You've got it all wrong! Great, just stomp on my dreams, why don't you. (What's with her? All she's said for the last few minutes is utter nonsense!) Have you ever thought, all those spikes protect it's top but what about underneath it? (When presenting incorrect evidence) Hey guess what? Actually, I really hate your guts. So get lost because, well I'm not co-operating.
articles.p3: I don't think Daddy was ever rich, even when he was in law. (Well excuuuse me, Princess. ...Anyway, should I ask to hear the story again...?) (Mia's really got this guy eating out of her hands…)
articles.p4: Objection sustained! The witness will refrain from rambling on the stand. Oh, Trucy's still a child. Here's what I want you to do, Trucy. Take that memory, gently lock it away deep in your heart, and never speak of it. (when seeing the Psyche-Locks for the first time) (W-WHAT IN THE WORLD?!) B-But why…!? Why would you do such a thing? (Huh? It wasn't Dahlia…?)
